/* CategoryMapper.seqsPlusOneIfCutsies */
UPDATE CATEGORIES CTG SET SEQ = (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CATEGORIES WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND SEQ = #{seq}) > 0 THEN SEQ + 1 ELSE SEQ END FROM CATEGORIES SUB WHERE CTG.ID = SUB.ID) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND SEQ >= #{seq}
